input:
Premise: Woman in a field of tall grass and wildflowers holding up a yellow scarf
Hypothesis: The woman is in a poppy field.
Update: Most of the plants are white and there is a big sign that reads 'Afghanistan' behind her.

Premise: Two people in a dark room look carefully at their computers.
Hypothesis: Two people are making money on mechanical turk.
Update: The people are talking through headsets on their heads

Premise: Two small dogs playing in a field with a small ball.
Hypothesis: Two puppies are playing with a small ball.
Update: The dogs are German Shepherds

Premise: A group of women walk down the street all carrying open umbrellas to protect them from the rain coming down from the sky.
Hypothesis: A group of women are leaving a wedding and shielding themselves from the elements with umbrellas.
Update: The women have shopping bags in their other hands.

Premise: Men, women and children dance at a party.
Hypothesis: Men, women and children are dancing at a party with streamers on the ceiling.
Update: The parents reserved to park for the birthday party two weeks ago.

Premise: The little footballer takes the field.
Hypothesis: The footballer is wearing a shirt.
Update: His dad is motioning for him to throw the ball.

Premise: A man and woman are holding hands as they walk down the street.
Hypothesis: A couple walking home after a dinner date
Update: It's winter and it's still light out.

Premise: A woman prepares ingredients for a bowl of soup.
Hypothesis: A woman is cutting carrots.
Update: The woman is making sopa toscana.

Premise: A blue vehicle carrying a large load of stuffed sacks along a rural road.
Hypothesis: A vehicle carrying bananas travels down a road.
Update: The road is in a jungle.

Premise: A mountain biker riding his bike down a muddy path with mud splashing into the air and the biker is covered in mud.
Hypothesis: The rider is mad because they are dirty.
Update: The rider is counting his change for the car wash.

Premise: A man doing an aerial stunt on a bike.
Hypothesis: A stunt man performs a bike trick for a movie shoot.
Update: The man is wearing an X Games bib.

Premise: Crowd at an outdoor event
Hypothesis: Crowd at an outdoor event was not as big as expected.
Update: They are in the crowd at the smaller stage at the back of the event.

Premise: Two people on a city street looking up into the night sky.
Hypothesis: Two people on a city street stare at the moon.
Update: There are many star constellations in the sky.

Premise: Several men dressed in blue uniforms march.
Hypothesis: Several men dressed in blue uniforms march in the parade
Update: The men start to draw their weapons on command.

Premise: Woman plays clarinet in front of two microphones.
Hypothesis: A clarinetist is performing a solo on stage in front of a large audience.
Update: The woman is a musician.

Premise: Construction workers wearing white hats and orange vests gathered together working on a project.
Hypothesis: The construction workers are working outdoors.
Update: The overhead flood lights brightened the dim corridor.

Premise: A man in a blue uniform holding a mop, and looking down at the floor.
Hypothesis: the man mops the gym room floor
Update: The room has tables and chairs in it

Premise: Kids out on a river touch the ends of their oars.
Hypothesis: Kids are out fishing in their canoes.
Update: The kids have their hooks ready sitting on the grass

Premise: An asian man in a blue jacket putting candles into a cake.
Hypothesis: A man in a jacket putting red candles into a cake.
Update: The package for the candles is red

Premise: A woman and a young boy read a book together in a living room.
Hypothesis: They are a part of a family.
Update: The tutor was hired to come over twice a week to help the child with his reading.

Premise: A group of spectators outside in the cold, all focusing on the same object.
Hypothesis: A bunch of people wearing heavy coats are standing together.
Update: The swim suit wearer are watching for the signal to jump into the freezing water to qualify for the Polar Bear Club.

Premise: A woman in the blue sweater is running through a brown field.
Hypothesis: A lady wearing a blue dress is running behind her dog.
Update: The dogs leash has snapped.

Premise: Older man and woman are in costume on stage during a performance.
Hypothesis: The man and woman are married.
Update: They are both employed by the acting company.

Premise: A woman holding a black purse is leaning with her elbow on the seat of a bicycle.
Hypothesis: A tall human holding a purse.
Update: She has to reach for most things.

Premise: A young boy in a baseball cap jumps into the arms of a man wearing a blue shirt.
Hypothesis: The boy jumps into his father's arms.
Update: The man is a little league coach.

Premise: An Asian woman in a red patched shirt carrying two watermelons down a sidewalk.
Hypothesis: The woman is carrying the watermelons to a friend.
Update: She is in a market

Premise: woman with reddish hair in nice attire eating cotton candy outside.
Hypothesis: old woman with reddish hair eating cotton candy
Update: The woman's hair has grays streaks in it.

Premise: Scene from a life show with man singing in the center, there are two women one on each side of him.
Hypothesis: There is a play going on.
Update: The mezzo-soprano has a solo coming up.

Premise: A woman wearing a brown hat hugging a child.
Hypothesis: A woman is hugging an upset child at the park.
Update: The child just stepped off of a school bus.

Premise: A woman looking out a window.
Hypothesis: A woman looking at a car.
Update: A woman is looking at a vehicle with four wheels with room for a driver and a few passengers.

Premise: A man with red loudspeaker wearing a shirt with German flag colors.
Hypothesis: man talking to crowd
Update: The loudspeaker is at the man's side.

Premise: One person is wearing a green shirt while sleeping on the sidewalk while another person wearing black pants is sleeping on the stairs.
Hypothesis: Two homeless people are asleep on the street corner.
Update: There was a massive fight in the area.

Premise: A large crowd of people walk, casually, across an elevated road or bridge.
Hypothesis: The people have their cellphones out.
Update: The people are at a protest.

Premise: Maintenance worker cleaning the side of a red and white train.
Hypothesis: A worker cleaning the side of a deisel-powered train.
Update: The train is very old and has wooden walls

Premise: Little girl crouches to splash fountain water.
Hypothesis: A girl is about to play in the water.
Update: The girl is fully clothed.

Premise: The Sooner football player carrying the ball is trying to avoid being tackled.
Hypothesis: A quarterback is holding a ball.
Update: The football player had just received a pass.

Premise: Four people wearing red, blue, white& black, walking up a white staircase overlooking a marina in an old city.
Hypothesis: The group of people are all part of a party.
Update: The people are drunk

Premise: Two researchers are looking into a microscope surrounded by complex machinery.
Hypothesis: The researchers went to the same university together.
Update: The researchers are part of a joint project between two universities.

Premise: Two people are walking up a snowy hill with a dog.
Hypothesis: Two people are in the mountains.
Update: The hill is a favorite spot for people to strength train.

Premise: Four kayakers and canoers near a rock wall.
Hypothesis: Some people are about to go rock climbing.
Update: Kayakers and canoers paddle to shore and start crossing the rock formations.

Premise: A group of people surround a tree as someone places dirt to bury the roots.
Hypothesis: people digging holes for a tree farm.
Update: People dig a hole  to plant a tree in front of a school.

Premise: People sitting on a bench watching a man play his guitar
Hypothesis: The man has a big audience
Update: The man is in a playing an acoustic guitar.

Premise: A cyclist carries his bicycle while jumping over a hurdle.
Hypothesis: A man is competing in a triathlon.
Update: The cyclist just got ran off the road at the Tour de France

Premise: A group of people are partying inside a building.
Hypothesis: The people are on a tour.
Update: The people are carrying cameras

Premise: A group of people sitting on railings at a car presentation with the catwalk being red and a red car lighting fixtures, a video screen with a brand on it on a wall in the background.
Hypothesis: A group of people are there on discount
Update: The people all make minimum wage.

Premise: A little boy playing with a sparkler in pure enjoyment.
Hypothesis: The boy is four years old.
Update: It is the boys birthday and there is a cake next to him with eight candles.

Premise: A lady in a library displaying a yellow book.
Hypothesis: A book displayed in a library
Update: She places it on the shelf and reaches for another book.

Premise: A man in a purple shirt walks down an alley with a cart full of a product.
Hypothesis: A man with a colorful shirt walks down a dark alley scared.
Update: The man walks down the alley with his eyes wide as he looks around him and behind him.

Premise: An older man dressed like an elevator attendant is standing outside at theme park.
Hypothesis: There was a gentleman that was dressed ready to work at the hotel.
Update: The man just clocked in..

Premise: A band of musicians playing music in the streets all wearing red shirts.
Hypothesis: A band of musicians begs for money in the street
Update: The band is very famous.

Premise: A dark-haired man in a striped shirt records a video of a gray-haired man using a MacBook laptop.
Hypothesis: The dark-haired man does not know the man who is using a laptop.
Update: The dark haired man asks the producer who the guy using the laptop is.

Premise: Drummers march down the street.
Hypothesis: Drummers march down the busy street.
Update: There are many cars and buildings.

Premise: A woman in a sleeveless shirt grins in the direction of the man in the adjoining plush bus seat.
Hypothesis: The man just said something funny.
Update: The man is a comedian.

Premise: Kids walking on the street, one blond girl wearing a white outfit drinking from a straw, one brown-haired girl in white shorts and dark top, turned around, holding her cellphone.
Hypothesis: Two older girls are walking down a suburban street.
Update: Tall high rises surround the girls

Premise: A group of men are holding a meeting.
Hypothesis: The men are sitting around a large table.
Update: The men shuffle the papers in front of them and some take a drink from the glass of water provided.

Premise: A cook puts finishing touches on a plate of food.
Hypothesis: A woman ices her cake
Update: A woman holds a salt shaker in her hand

Premise: Man slightly bent over has child's toy stuck between his legs.
Hypothesis: The man stuck the toy between his legs.
Update: the man attempts to remove it

Premise: Some people participating in a road race.
Hypothesis: students organize bike ride.
Update: The race will determine who is the fastest in the city.

Premise: A little girl is talking to her father while she is waiting to eat.
Hypothesis: A father is wearing a shirt
Update: The people are at the beach.

Premise: A man standing in front of a blue wall looking down while smoking.
Hypothesis: A man stands near a wall during a smoke break.
Update: The man will have to go back to work soon.

Premise: A group of African American people dressed up have their hands together as if in prayer.
Hypothesis: A group of black people have their hands together during church
Update: They are gathered at the Lincoln Memorial.

Premise: Two young men are seated in front of a green pool of water.
Hypothesis: The men have been there for hours
Update: The person who dropped them off honks as they drive away.

Premise: Four people are sitting at a picnic bench eating while a fifth man stands next to the bench.
Hypothesis: Four people are having a picnic while excluding their friend because he was a jerk.
Update: The person standing gives the people sitting the middle finger

Premise: 3 people passing the bus stop while on a bike ride down the street.
Hypothesis: People riding bikes at night.
Update: The people are holding some newspapers.

Premise: two guys sitting on the floor, with the guy in the green jacket reading a piece of paper.
Hypothesis: The piece of paper is an eviction notice for the couple.
Update: Both the men look sad.

Premise: A young girl who is sitting on a giant orange pumpkin and is surrounded by pots of flowers smiles for the camera.
Hypothesis: A young girl is surrounded by pots of flowers she will soon be planting.
Update: She likes to decorate her yard in the fall.

Premise: Two men play basketball.
Hypothesis: Two men are competing for the last spot on the basketball team.
Update: Two men are competing to become the final teammate on the basketball team this season.

Premise: A guy is being double teamed in basketball.
Hypothesis: Two big guys are pushing up on one guy.
Update: The two guys guarding are point guards

Premise: Construction workers wearing bright orange suits are working on a road in the rain.
Hypothesis: Construction workers working quickly to get out of the rain
Update: Hard hats and mud litter the area.

Premise: an older woman is walking down the sidewalk in a blue jumpsuit while carrying a basket of bananas.
Hypothesis: A woman is done with shopping some delicious fruit.
Update: She has a name tag on her jumpsuit.

Premise: Three people are sitting and waiting.
Hypothesis: Two people can't wait any longer.
Update: The people all look relaxed.

Premise: A group of cyclists ride in the rain along a road with a red BMW driving by.
Hypothesis: A group of cyclists are moving to the side of the road to avoid getting splashed by a car.
Update: The area is under a drought.

Premise: A small group of adults and children are wearing hats and shorts on the sandy beach near the blue water.
Hypothesis: A small group of adults and children are joyously wearing hats
Update: They are making a sand castle.

Premise: A girl jumps in the air.
Hypothesis: A jump roping girl.
Update: The girl is singing a catchy song

Premise: A lady sitting in a chair outdoors in the rain.
Hypothesis: A sad lady sitting in a chair outdoors in the rain.
Update: A lady smiles and laughs as she sits in a chair in the rain.

Premise: A blond man in a black shirt and shorts sitting at a table eating with a glass of wine.
Hypothesis: A man is at a picnic being ignored by the other people there.
Update: There are lots of people on a grassy area eating around him but not with him.

Premise: The red team knocked the ball toward the goal and the black team tried to block it.
Hypothesis: The teams are playing soccer.
Update: The players are all wearing face masks and shoulder pads.

Premise: 2 men playing a game of chess.
Hypothesis: the men are chess experts
Update: They play in a bar.

Premise: A young boy rides a small paddling boat.
Hypothesis: The boy rides the boat by himself.
Update: He is on a family vacation.

Premise: A group of grown men walking are walking down the street playing instruments.
Hypothesis: A marching band is playing in a parade.
Update: They are playing the dirge in a New Orleans style funeral.

Premise: A young man is rollerblading while grinding on an arched rail.
Hypothesis: A young man rollerblades at a skate park.
Update: The young man's friend is calling him from the other side.

Premise: A bunch of asian children on steps.
Hypothesis: Children are waiting to be picked up.
Update: The children are in rows, posing for a picture.

Premise: A truck-driver is working on his truck.
Hypothesis: A truck driver works on his red truck.
Update: The drivers's favorite color is red.

Premise: A group of people looking at a woman wearing a white dress.
Hypothesis: the boy was listening
Update: The boy thought the woman was going to sing a song.

Premise: The man is driving his equipment under the archway.
Hypothesis: The sad man is driving his equipment under the archway.
Update: The man just got a promotion at work.

Premise: A mime in white face makeup, wearing a black bolero hat, white suit, white angel wings, standing next to a man in a green shirt, tan pants, smiling broadly.
Hypothesis: man taunting mime
Update: The man is a theater critic

Premise: A large crowd of people are walking down the street.
Hypothesis: A group is walking to a festival.
Update: It's raining and thundering.

Premise: Men in snow, one looking at the camera and the other reading a journal.
Hypothesis: The man is reading his old journals.
Update: It's the Ladies Home Journal.

Premise: A man in a blue sweatshirt taking a picture
Hypothesis: A man is taking a picture of a woman.
Update: A man is pulled over at a popular sightseeing point.

Premise: Street performers dance and play music during a parade.
Hypothesis: It is a Mardi Gras parade.
Update: It's February.

Premise: A large poster of a shaggy buffalo hangs over the head of a man in a blue shirt holding a red bag.
Hypothesis: A brown haired guy is standing underneath a poster of a buffalo.
Update: There are two men in the room.

Premise: A surfer rides his surfboard at the start of a wave.
Hypothesis: There are several people surfing on big waves.
Update: the wave crashes soon after

Premise: Band playing in gazebo while couple dances in foreground.
Hypothesis: The band was playing.
Update: There's loud music coming from the gazebo.

Premise: People watch as a bunch of boys stand around and perhaps hold still a large pole.
Hypothesis: The boys are playing tetherball.
Update: They're near a school building

Premise: People gathered outside a building in the dark.
Hypothesis: people are gathered outside a building because it's a night time fire drill.
Update: The location is a military base.

Premise: The red lines are slanted.
Hypothesis: The lines point northeast
Update: The arrow is at the top of the slant.

Premise: A young boy is playing with his ball in front of a building.
Hypothesis: A boy is very bored.
Update: The boy is intent on beating his record for most slam-dunks in a row.

Premise: Children are rollerblading in a courtyard.
Hypothesis: Children are rollerblading in a courtyard on their way to the field.
Update: There is a field down the street from the courtyard.

Premise: There are Asian people on a bench enjoying a snack.
Hypothesis: There are Asian people eating orange chicken as a snack on the beach.
Update: They are eating out of take out containers.

Premise: A man is performing acrobatics over a group of people kneeling on the ground.
Hypothesis: The acrobat is doing a hard trick.
Update: He is sitting on the trapez waving to the crowd

Premise: A man is playing tug-of-war with his dog.
Hypothesis: The man and dog are outside.
Update: The sun is getting in the man's eyes.

Premise: Man walking down into subway.
Hypothesis: an old man walks down stairs into the subway
Update: The man is 30 years old.

Premise: A toddler boy in a racing jacket tries out the green hula hoop.
Hypothesis: The toddler boy is trying out the hula hoop outside.
Update: He picks the hula hoop up off the grass and tries again.
